name: wpoets/awesome-enterprise
description: The Awesome Enterprise Framework for low code development in PHP

suggest.wpoets/communication-handler: Email, SMS and Push notification API Integration handler for Awesome enterprise
suggest.wpoets/docx-handler: Add support for parsing docx file by introducing docx.parse_template shortcode
suggest.wpoets/facebook-handler: Facebook API Integration handler for Awesome enterprise
suggest.wpoets/google-handler: Google API Integration handler for Awesome enterprise
suggest.wpoets/linkedin-handler: LinkedIn API Integration handler for Awesome enterprise
suggest.wpoets/payments-handler: Adds support for payment gateway integrations by introducing aw2.pay shortcode
suggest.wpoets/pdf-handler: Handler for PDF creation and parsing in Awesome Enterprise
suggest.wpoets/woocommerce-handler: Handler for working with WooCommerce products in Awesome Enterprise
suggest.wpoets/exotel-handler: Adds support to work with Exotel API within Awesome Enterprise, introduces exotel.* shortcodes
